name: Omnomnom Game BETA
description:
In this puzzle game you have to help four mothers catch their babies! (they don't eat them, they just keep them safe in their bellies)! Drag the mothers over the babies of the same color to catch them. You can swap a mother with another one if you're stuck.

There are two modes:

- Classic Play: You have one minute to do the higher score.

- Zen Play: You have 50 moves to do the higher score.

A big thank you to John Axon who has done an awesome job for the music and sounds! And also to the Pixelles, who always pushed me and motivated me <3 

I'm really sorry for Mac and Linux users but my beta version of Omnomnom Game works only for Windows.

Have fun!
